import React from 'react' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' import { userAuthorPromise } from '../redux/slices/userauthorslice' import {useDispatch} from 'react-redux' function Signin() { let {register,handleSubmit,formState:{errors}}=useForm() let navigate=useNavigate() let dispatch=useDispatch() function submit(userCredObj){ dispatch(userAuthorPromise(userCredObj)) } return (
